title: Tech Leader
summaryIntro: At BEES (AB InBev), I contributed significantly to the development of global digital platforms. My achievements include:
highlights: Standardized BFF architecture using NestJS and Clean Architecture, resolving frontend-backend dependencies. This approach, combined with WireMock, enabled parallel development and decoupled data processing from legacy contracts.
Acted as Cross-Product Tech Lead (Grow, Force, Control Tower), defining MVVM patterns and elevating the team's technical bar through Code Reviews and Pair Programming.
Architected the global ecosystem using Single-SPA and Module Federation, scaling to 10+ MFEs and 5 BFFs across 22 countries, significantly reducing bootstrap time for new services.

Engineered proactive observability with New Relic and custom Bundle Analyzers, enabling real-time detection of performance issues correlated with user environments (browser versions, network conditions) before they impact end-users.
Expanded technical scope to the Backend, supporting the team with Java and Spring.
